name: Kundan Kumar
description: I had contacted many others, but finally decided to get my design done from him. Really impressed with the final outcome. I had a small plot size and complicated requirements, but he was able to come up with an impressive design and efficient use of real estate.

Besides that, I liked his professional behavior. He also has contact with builders that can help you with construction at reasonable price and good quality. Basically he has reassured to help me end to end directly or indirectly. Really satisfied with the service. Totally recommend.

name: Surbhi Rani
description: We met Nikhil sir for our house design correction , earlier it was with many mistakes done by some other architect. We are very impressed by Nikhil sir works, he really did best in correcting our house design by taking care of our requirement. Work was good , so we decided for structure design too and going onwards for rest design will be in contact with him. Structure work is also very detailed and they provide it after verifying with all required process .

We wish we could have contacted him earlier , i would suggest please contact him without any doubt. He understands the requirement very well and best he suggests. Nikhil sir are providing best facility in Patna . Thank you Nikhil sir for all the help üòá.
